== Vaniyamkulam- II (CT) (627601) ==

Vaniyamkulam- II (CT) is a town in the [[Ottappalam]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 20.04 sq. km. and harbouring 3896 households with total population of 16085 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Palakkad]] is at a distance of 70 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 350 km. Male population is 7750 and female population is 8335. Scheduled Caste population is 2760 and Scheduled Tribes population is 6. Census Location Code of the town is 627601<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Palakkad (m) at a distance of 70 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Coimbatore(m corp. )  at a distance of 90 km. Railway station is at Ottappalam at a distance of 8 km.
